questions.question: Please provide the trend of Return on Equity (ROE) for Banking companies from 2020 to Q2 2024.  Specifically, I need the ROE for each quarter within that period for each bank.
For Vietcombank and Techcombank, please provide the quarterly data for the Debt-to-Equity ratio from 2020 to Q2 2024.
What is the Return on Equity (ROE) for Banking companies for Q2 2024?
questions.description: This question asks for the ROE of all banking companies in Q2 2024.  It requires calculating ROE using data from the financial reports of the specified companies and quarter.

questions.question: What was the Debt-to-Equity ratio for Vietcombank and Techcombank in Q4 2023?
questions.description: This question asks for the Debt-to-Equity ratio for two specific banking companies (Vietcombank and Techcombank) in a specific quarter (Q4 2023). It requires obtaining the relevant data from their financial reports for that period.

questions.question: What is the Return on Equity (ROE) for all Banking companies in 2023?
What were the current ratio and quick ratio for Vinamilk and Masan Group in Q2 2024?
What were the Return on Equity (ROE) and Return on Assets (ROA) ratios for Vietcombank, Techcombank, and ACB in 2022?  Provide a comparison of these ratios across the three banks.
Compare the Price-to-Earnings (P/E) ratios of Vinamilk, Masan Group, and another Food and Beverages company in 2023 Q2. Which company had the highest P/E ratio during that quarter?

What is the Return on Equity (ROE) for Banking industry companies (BIDV, Eximbank, OCB Bank, VietinBank, Vietcombank, ACB, MBBank, HDBank, TPBank, VPBank, Sacombank, Techcombank, SH Bank, VIBBank) in Q2 2024 and how does it compare to their ROE in Q2 2020?
questions.description: This question compares ROE of multiple banking companies across two different quarters to analyze profitability and shareholder return.

questions.question: Compare the Current Ratio of Vinhomes, Vincom Retail, and Novaland in Q1 2024.  How does this compare to their respective Current Ratios in Q1 2020?
questions.description: This question compares the liquidity of three real estate companies across two different quarters to assess their short-term debt-paying abilities.
